articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: OpenAI to use Oracle's chips for more AI compute - The Verge
articles.description: OpenAI is teaming up with Oracle to get more capacity to run its ChatGPT. The move suggests that OpenAI isn’t able to get all the compute it needs from Microsoft.
articles.content:
OpenAI to use Oracles chips for more AI compute

 / Oracle will enable OpenAI to continue to scale, says Sam Altman.

articles.title: Pure Storage pwned, claims data plundered by crims who broke into Snowflake workspace - The Register
